Text:
For anyone interested this seems to need a bit more work before it can replace your regular audio player, i recommend foobar2000 since it uses less cpu power than this app.

If you try to open this program it might give you an error just drag and drop an mp3 to it.
Please make sure to read the README at http://code.google.com/p/psymp3/source/browse/trunk/README - I forgot to include this!
